The teams were made up of alumni who&#039;ve since achieved distinction in their fields - including many well known faces - and it was the all-female St Anne&#039;s Oxford team who absolutely slayed.   (BBC\/Screenshot)   TV correspondent Jacky Rowland, art historian and broadcaster Dr Janina Ramirez, BBC News science correspondent Rebecca Morelle and chairman of the Science Museum Group Mary Archer walked over the Manchester team with 185 points to 55. The college was formerly a women&#039;s college but has been coeducational since 1979.   These women are slaying on #UniversityChallenge pic.twitter.com\/GZidYQF5BM -- Eve Alcock (@EveAlcock) December 19, 2016      4 women on the same team! That&#039;s some sort of #UniversityChallenge record even for an all women&#039;s college -- Mike ?? ???? Huge respect. -- Elf-is ? (@EllisReadss) December 19, 2016    Team captain Mary Archer was everyone&#039;s stand out contestant.   (BBC\/Screenshot)     Mary Archer is good. Very good #universitychallenge That team seem like they want this -- Fiji Diddy (@damobullimore) December 19, 2016      Archer is goals #UniversityChallenge -- Orla Hanratty (@OrlaAHanratty) December 19, 2016      Who&#039;d have thought it, I love Mary Archer! #UniversityChallenge -- Katy Greenwood (@katygreenwood) December 19, 2016    The Manchester team - including poet Simon Armitage, president of the Paralympic Committee Sir Philip Craven, journalist Sarfraz Manzoor and the Natural History Museums&#039;s Erica McAlister will probably be kicking themselves.   (BBC\/Screenshot)     Does Manchester&#039;s buzzer work? #UniversityChallenge -- Dave Quirk (@daviequirk) December 19, 2016      Are Manchester still on set or have they gone to the bar? #UniversityChallenge -- penny green (@pennygreen3) December 19, 2016      I hope Manchester have enjoyed their glasses of water...#UniversityChallenge -- Ashleigh (@Ashleighw13) December 19, 2016    But it really did put our post-university achievements into rather harsh perspective. 	var C3S = typeof C3S !== "undefined" && typeof C3S === "object" ? C3S : {};

	C3S.user_layout = window.DI && !!window.DI.activeLayout && window.DI.activeLayout() || 'desktop';
  	C3S.layout_map 	= {'desktop': false, 'tablet': 'largescreen', 'wide-phone': 'mediumscreen', 'phone': 'smallscreen'};
	C3S.used_layout = C3S.layout_map[C3S.user_layout];  
	
	C3S.setOmnitureProps  = function(obj) {
	
		if ( typeof io_c3sd === "undefined" || typeof io_c3sd['omniture'] === "undefined" ) return;
		obj.prop17 = typeof io_c3sd['omniture']['prop17'] !== "undefined" ? io_c3sd['omniture']['prop17'] : 'aolukns';

		if ( typeof io_c3sd === "undefined" || typeof io_c3sd['omniture'] === "undefined" ) return;
		s_account = typeof io_c3sd['omniture']['s_account'] !== "undefined" ? io_c3sd['omniture']['s_account'] : 'aolukjunglobal';
	}

	var io_c3s 			= io_c3s || {};
	io_c3s.queryStrings = [];

				<section data-swiftype-name="body" data-swiftype-type="text" class="lo-left" data-beacon='{&quot;p&quot;: {&quot;mlid&quot;: &quot;col1&quot;}}'>
								<article class="show-article">
		
				    	<div class="breadcrumbs clearfix" itemscope itemtype="http://data-vocabulary.org/Breadcrumb" data-beacon='{"p": {"mnid": "generic-bread-crumb"}}'>
		
									<span class="crumb-wrapper">
									<a data-beacon='{"p": {"lnid": "lnk1"}}' href="/entertainment/" class="breadcrumb" itemprop="url" itemtype="http://data-vocabulary.org/Breadcrumb">
						<span itemprop="title">Home</span>

												<span class="crumb-wrapper">
									<a data-beacon='{"p": {"lnid": "lnk2"}}' href="/entertainment/tv/" class="breadcrumb last" itemprop="child" itemtype="http://data-vocabulary.org/Breadcrumb">
						<span itemprop="title">TV</span>
					</a>
												</span>
						</div>

				<header>
		  <div class="show-article-title">
		        	<h1 class="page-title">Dame Mary Archer was everyone's hero on the famous all-female team for the University Challenge Christmas special</h1>

		    		  </div>
		  <div class="show-article-topbar clearfix" data-beacon='{"p": {"mnid":"article-header"}}'>
		  
        <div class="sponsored-logo" id="sponsored-logo"></div>
		    <div class="show-article-byline">
		    		      By <span class="show-article-author">PA</span>
		    		    		      <span>&nbsp;<time>19 Dec 2016, 21:48</time></span>
		    		    </div>
		    		        
		    		      		        <div class="show-article-modified-date">
		          <span>Updated:&nbsp;</span><time>20 Dec 2016, 9:05</time>
		        </div>
		      		    		    
		    			  		
		  </div>
		
          		  		  
		  <div class="show-article-share-options aol_share_top " data-beacon='{"p": {"mnid":"social-links-top"}}'>
		    <a name="aol-share" class="aol-share clearfix" data-bid="932" data-pid="21631176" href="//www.aol.co.uk/2016/12/19/dame-mary-archer-was-everyones-hero-on-the-famous-all-female-te/" title="Dame Mary Archer was everyone&#039;s hero on the famous all-female team for the University Challenge Christmas special">-</a>
		  </div>
		  
		</header>		
		<section>
		  <div data-swiftype-name="desc" data-swiftype-type="text" class="show-article-content clearfix" data-beacon='{"p": {"mnid":"article-body"}}'>
		    		    	<div class="article-snappa" data-category="snap-celebrity"><p>If there's anything to make you feel bad about not using your degree to its full potential it's the University Challenge Christmas special.</p><p>The teams were made up of alumni who've since achieved distinction in their fields - including many well known faces - and it was the all-female St Anne's Oxford team who absolutely slayed.</p><figure><div class="article-feed-image-wrapper"><img alt="University Challenge" data-credit="" src="http://snappa.static.pressassociation.io/assets/2016/12/19211541/1482182141-e06d061a77a7bde916b8a91163029d41-600x354.jpg" /></div><figcaption>(BBC/Screenshot)</figcaption></figure><p></p><p>TV correspondent Jacky Rowland, art historian and broadcaster Dr Janina Ramirez, BBC News science correspondent Rebecca Morelle and chairman of the Science Museum Group Mary Archer walked over the Manchester team with 185 points to 55. The college was formerly a women's college but has been coeducational since 1979.</p><figure><blockquote class="twitter-tweet"><p lang="en">These women are slaying on <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/UniversityChallenge?src=hash">#UniversityChallenge</a><a href="https://t.co/GZidYQF5BM">pic.twitter.com/GZidYQF5BM</a></p><p>-- Eve Alcock (@EveAlcock) <a href="https://twitter.com/EveAlcock/status/810943617518936065">December 19, 2016</a></p></blockquote><p></p></figure><figure><blockquote class="twitter-tweet"><p lang="en">4 women on the same team! That's some sort of <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/UniversityChallenge?src=hash">#UniversityChallenge</a> record even for an all women's college</p><p>-- Mike ?? ???? (@mikebirty) <a href="https://twitter.com/mikebirty/status/810939022394658816">December 19, 2016</a></p></blockquote><p></p></figure><figure><blockquote class="twitter-tweet"><p lang="en">5/8 contestants on <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/UniversityChallenge?src=hash">#UniversityChallenge</a> are female - Brilliant representation!</p><p>-- Roseanna (@roseannasale) <a href="https://twitter.com/roseannasale/status/810939598536929280">December 19, 2016</a></p></blockquote><p></p></figure><figure><blockquote class="twitter-tweet"><p lang="en">The St Anne's Oxford team on <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/UniversityChallenge?src=hash">#UniversityChallenge</a> are slaying. Huge respect.</p><!--@outstreamvideoinjection@--><section class="outstream-video-player"><div id="579a0d1888d2ff1b039656f2" class="vdb_player vdb_579a0d1888d2ff1b039656f2564dfd34bbe5c146d4b33c86" vdb_params="m.channel=entertainment&amp;m.adminibar=true&amp;m.o2inline=inview"><script>
			$(document).ready(function() {
				var s = document.createElement("script");
				s.type = "text/javascript";
				s.src = "//delivery.vidible.tv/jsonp/pid=579a0d1888d2ff1b039656f2/564dfd34bbe5c146d4b33c86.js?m.channel=entertainment&amp;m.adminibar=true&amp;m.o2inline=inview";
				$("#579a0d1888d2ff1b039656f2").html($(s));
			});
	    </script></div></section><p>-- Elf-is ? (@EllisReadss) <a href="https://twitter.com/EllisReadss/status/810942095838089216">December 19, 2016</a></p></blockquote><p></p></figure><p>Team captain Mary Archer was everyone's stand out contestant.</p><figure><div class="article-feed-image-wrapper"><img alt="(BBC2/Screenshot)" data-credit="" src="http://snappa.static.pressassociation.io/assets/2016/12/19202808/1482179288-7151184986aed9f8f418938930271d37-600x379.jpg" /></div><figcaption>(BBC/Screenshot)</figcaption></figure><p></p><figure><blockquote class="twitter-tweet"><p lang="en">Mary Archer is good. Very good <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/universitychallenge?src=hash">#universitychallenge</a></p><p>That team seem like they want this</p><p>-- Fiji Diddy (@damobullimore) <a href="https://twitter.com/damobullimore/status/810942056017367044">December 19, 2016</a></p></blockquote><p></p></figure><figure><blockquote class="twitter-tweet"><p lang="en">Archer is goals <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/UniversityChallenge?src=hash">#UniversityChallenge</a></p><p>-- Orla Hanratty (@OrlaAHanratty) <a href="https://twitter.com/OrlaAHanratty/status/810943404624506881">December 19, 2016</a></p></blockquote><p></p></figure><figure><blockquote class="twitter-tweet"><p lang="en">Who'd have thought it, I love Mary Archer! <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/UniversityChallenge?src=hash">#UniversityChallenge</a></p><p>-- Katy Greenwood (@katygreenwood) <a href="https://twitter.com/katygreenwood/status/810942281209511937">December 19, 2016</a></p></blockquote><p></p></figure><p>The Manchester team - including poet Simon Armitage, president of the Paralympic Committee Sir Philip Craven, journalist Sarfraz Manzoor and the Natural History Museums's Erica McAlister will probably be kicking themselves.</p><figure><div class="article-feed-image-wrapper"><img alt="University Challenge (BBC/Screenshot)" data-credit="" src="http://snappa.static.pressassociation.io/assets/2016/12/19211756/1482182275-e06d061a77a7bde916b8a91163029d41-600x361.jpg" /></div><figcaption>(BBC/Screenshot)</figcaption></figure><p></p><figure><blockquote class="twitter-tweet"><p lang="en">Does Manchester's buzzer work? <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/UniversityChallenge?src=hash">#UniversityChallenge</a></p><p>-- Dave Quirk (@daviequirk) <a href="https://twitter.com/daviequirk/status/810942099625492480">December 19, 2016</a></p></blockquote><p></p></figure><figure><blockquote class="twitter-tweet"><p lang="en">Are Manchester still on set or have they gone to the bar? <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/UniversityChallenge?src=hash">#UniversityChallenge</a></p><p>-- penny green (@pennygreen3) <a href="https://twitter.com/pennygreen3/status/810942834387906563">December 19, 2016</a></p></blockquote><p></p></figure><figure><blockquote class="twitter-tweet"><p lang="en">I hope Manchester have enjoyed their glasses of water...<a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/UniversityChallenge?src=hash">#UniversityChallenge</a></p><p>-- Ashleigh (@Ashleighw13) <a href="https://twitter.com/Ashleighw13/status/810944755114840064">December 19, 2016</a></p></blockquote><p></p></figure><p>But it really did put our post-university achievements into rather harsh perspective.</p><figure><blockquote class="twitter-tweet"><p lang="en">Listening to what these alumni have done makes me realise I've done naff all since leaving university <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/UniversityChallenge?src=hash">#UniversityChallenge</a></p><p>-- Jack Poynter (@JPoynter91) <a href="https://twitter.com/JPoynter91/status/810939314293108736">December 19, 2016</a></p></blockquote><p></p></figure><!-- (function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){(i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)})(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga'); ga('create', 'UA-51232094-1', 'auto', {'name': 'snappa'}); ga('snappa.set', 'referrer', location.origin); ga('snappa.set', 'contentGroup1', 'story'); ga('snappa.set', 'dimension2', '5cd7564e-f968-3574-b010-0e9f3891d7f6'); ga('snappa.set', 'dimension6', 'laurenta'); ga('snappa.send', 'pageview', { 'location': location.href, 'page': (location.pathname + location.search + location.hash), 'title': 'Dame Mary Archer was everyone's hero on the famous all-female team for the University Challenge Christmas special '}); //--></div><br continued/>
		    					    		  </div>
		  		  		  
		  		  
		</section>	
				
		
		
 				    		        	<section class="like-and-feedback clearfix" data-beacon='{"p": {"mnid":"fb-like-and-correction-suggestion"}}'>
				<p class="link-suggestion">
			<a data-beacon='{"p": {"lnid": "feedback-suggestion-lnk"}}' href="https://www.aol.co.uk/entertainment/2016/12/19/dame-mary-archer-was-everyones-hero-on-the-famous-all-female-te/" class="aol-feedback-plugin-link" title="Suggest a correction" data-additional-data-points="{'pageUrl':'https://www.aol.co.uk/entertainment/2016/12/19/dame-mary-archer-was-everyones-hero-on-the-famous-all-female-te/'}" data-client="aolcom_en_uk" data-dev-id="ao1wnWQbJWrM53t-" data-beacon-invalid="true"><button class="aol-btn alternative-btn">Suggest a correction</button></a>
		</p>							
		</section>

(function(d, s, id) {
	  var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
	  if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
	  js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;
	  js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/sdk.js#xfbml=1&version=v2.8&appId=183146218394780";
	  fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
	}(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));

window.twttr = (function(d, s, id) {
	  var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
	    t = window.twttr || {};
	  if (d.getElementById(id)) return t;
	  js = d.createElement(s);
	  js.id = id;
	  js.src = "https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js";
	  fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);

	  t._e = [];
	  t.ready = function(f) {
	    t._e.push(f);
	  };

	  return t;
	}(document, "script", "twitter-wjs"));
</script>

                    					<div class="list-post-description">
                        <h3 class="list-post-title">
                            <a data-beacon='{&quot;p&quot;: {&quot;lnid&quot;: &quot;title_lnk2&quot;}}' rel="bookmark" class="list-post-link" href="https://www.aol.co.uk/video/emma-stone-enjoys-a-fun-filled-day-at-disneyland-see-the-pics-/5a89d1dcb90afb5b8a90c86a/">

                            </a>

                <article class="list-post-item   lead-to-video-page-icon" >
                							<div class="list-post-image">
	                         <a data-beacon='{&quot;p&quot;: {&quot;lnid&quot;: &quot;img_lnk3&quot;}}' rel="bookmark" class="list-post-link" href="https://www.aol.co.uk/video/jessica-alba-shares-pic-breastfeeding-her-newborn-son-hayes-in-a-dressing-room-/5a89c92ed0e3cf54a91d3f6f/">
	                         								 		<img src="https://o.aolcdn.com/images/dims?thumbnail=650%2C427&amp;image_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fs.aolcdn.com%2Fdims-global%2Fdims%2FBLOG%2F5%2F145%2F96%2F100%2Fhttps%3A%2F%2Fimg.vidible.tv%2Fprod%2F2018-02%2F18%2F5a89c92ed0e3cf54a91d3f6f%2F5a89c92dc5ab0e452d799431_o_F_v0.jpg&amp;client=cbc79c14efcebee57402&amp;signature=8fe78045e5802771ff8356bbfc6583da61b61bca" alt="Jessica&#x20;Alba&#x20;Shares&#x20;Pic&#x20;Breastfeeding&#x20;Her&#x20;Newborn&#x20;Son&#x20;Hayes&#x20;in&#x20;a&#x20;Dressing&#x20;Room&#x21;" class="list-post-img" />
	                            	                         </a>
	                    </div>
                    					<div class="list-post-description">
                        <h3 class="list-post-title">
                            <a data-beacon='{&quot;p&quot;: {&quot;lnid&quot;: &quot;title_lnk3&quot;}}' rel="bookmark" class="list-post-link" href="https://www.aol.co.uk/video/jessica-alba-shares-pic-breastfeeding-her-newborn-son-hayes-in-a-dressing-room-/5a89c92ed0e3cf54a91d3f6f/">
                                Jessica Alba Shares Pic Breastfeeding Her Newborn Son Hayes in a Dressing Room!
                            </a>
                        </h3>
                                            </div>
                </article>
                                                                             

                <article class="list-post-item   lead-to-video-page-icon" >
                							<div class="list-post-image">

                <article class="list-post-item   lead-to-video-page-icon" >

<section class="module newsletter-signup-form entertainment" data-beacon='{"p": {"mnid": "sailthru-newsletter-signup.display"}}'>

	 
	<h3 class="m-title aside-entries__title">Let us send you our Newsletter</h3> 
		
	<div class="m-text">
		<p class="m-text-desc text-side-indent">Our editors will email you a roundup of their favourite stories from across AOL</p>
	</div>	

	<div id="aol-newsletter" class="aol-newsletter ">
					
			<form method="post" action="//www.aol.co.uk/b-c/sailthru/signup.php" id="sign-up-form">

		</form>
	</div>
	
	<div class="follow-us-section clearfix" >

		<div class="fb-follow" data-href="https://www.facebook.com/aoltraveluk/" data-layout="button" data-action="like" data-size="large" ></div>

	</div>
	
</section>
<script>


(function(d, s, id) {
	  var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
	  if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
	  js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;
	  js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/sdk.js#xfbml=1&version=v2.8&appId=183146218394780";
	  fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
	}(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));

window.twttr = (function(d, s, id) {
	  var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
	    t = window.twttr || {};
	  if (d.getElementById(id)) return t;
	  js = d.createElement(s);
	  js.id = id;
	  js.src = "https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js";
	  fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);

	  t._e = [];
	  t.ready = function(f) {
	    t._e.push(f);
	  };

	  return t;
	}(document, "script", "twitter-wjs"));
</script>

				<div class="lo-content-footer content-footer" data-beacon='{"p": {"mlid": "content-footer"}}'>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		(function($){
			$('.aol-newsletter').length && AOLUK.NewsLetterSignup("https://aol123.createsend.com/t/t/s/qjdllu/","cm-qjdllu-qjdllu");

<script>
$(function(){

    // Enable carousels generated by listpost
	$(".xd-carousel").length && $(".xd-carousel").each(function() {
	   $(this).xdCarousel($(this).data("carousel"));
    })

    // Apply programmatic responsive changes
    var _responsiveClassChanges = function() {
		$("[data-responsive]").each(function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            var responsiveSettings = $this.data("responsive");
            for(var matchingLayouts in responsiveSettings) {
                if(DI.currentLayout.match(new RegExp(matchingLayouts,"mig"))) {
                    $this.removeClass().addClass(responsiveSettings[matchingLayouts]);
                }
            }
        });
    }

    // Add device css class to body on change
    $body = $("body");
    DI.currentLayout = DI.activeLayout();
    $body.addClass("device-"+DI.currentLayout);
    _responsiveClassChanges(); // apply responsive changes on load
    // and listen for future layout changes
    $(window).resize(function() {
        if(DI.activeLayout()!= DI.currentLayout) {
            $body.removeClass("device-"+DI.currentLayout);
            DI.currentLayout = DI.activeLayout();
            $body.addClass("device-"+DI.currentLayout);
			_responsiveClassChanges();
        }
    })

    // Generic tab controls
    $('[data-tab-control]').each(function(){
        var $this = $(this);
        var $contentPages=$($this.data("tab-control"));
        $contentPages.addClass("tab-content");
        $tabs=$this.find("a");
        $tabs.click(function(e){
            e.preventDefault();
            $tabs.removeClass("selected");
            $contentPages.removeClass("selected");
            $(this).addClass("selected");
            $contentPages.filter($(this).attr("href")).addClass("selected");
        });
    });

    // Taboola
	window._taboola = window._taboola || [];
	_taboola.push({flush: true});

});


</script>
    <!-- Facebook Pixel Code -->
<script>
!function(f,b,e,v,n,t,s){if(f.fbq)return;n=f.fbq=function()
{n.callMethod? n.callMethod.apply(n,arguments):n.queue.push(arguments)}
;if(!f._fbq)f._fbq=n;
n.push=n;n.loaded=!0;n.version='2.0';n.queue=[];t=b.createElement(e);t.async=!0;
t.src=v;s=b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];s.parentNode.insertBefore(t,s)}(window,
document,'script','https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js');
fbq('init', '1112906175403201'); // Insert your pixel ID here.
fbq('track', 'PageView');
</script>
<noscript><img height="1" width="1" style="display:none"
src="https://www.facebook.com/tr?id=1112906175403201&ev=PageView&noscript=1"
/></noscript>
<!-- DO NOT MODIFY -->
<!-- End Facebook Pixel Code -->				<script>
(function($) {

	Array.prototype.getUnique=function(y){var x=1,t,r={},i=this.length,n=[];for(t=0;i>t;t+=1)r[this[t]]=this[t];for(t in r){n.push((y!==undefined&&((y==='i'&&x||y)+'|')||'')+r[t]);x++}return n};

	function dataLayerTracker() {

		var $allBeacons = $('[data-beacon][data-beacon^="{"][data-beacon$="}"]:not([data-ignore-for-vanity]):not(:hidden)'),
			has = 'hasOwnProperty',
			all_mnids = $allBeacons.map(function() {

				var beacon = $(this).data('beacon');
				beacon = typeof beacon === "object" && beacon || $.parseJSON(beacon);

				if (beacon[has]('p') && beacon['p'][has]('mnid') && $.trim(beacon['p']['mnid']) !== '') {
					return beacon['p']['mnid'];
				}
			}),
			dl_brand = io_c3sd && io_c3sd.omniture && io_c3sd.omniture.prop17 || "aoluk",
			dl_site = io_c3sd && io_c3sd.omniture && io_c3sd.omniture.prop21 || "portal";
			all_mnids = $.makeArray(all_mnids).getUnique(-77).join(',');

		bN_cfg = {
			h: [location.hostname],
			b: "b.aol.com",
			p: [
				["dL_ch", "uk.aolcoment"],
				["dL_dpt", "acm\x3A\x20article"],
				["dL_sDpt", "acm\x3A\x20main"],
								["dL_filedUnder", "tv"],
				["dL_tags", "celebrity\x2D\x26\x2Dshowbiz,featured,jeremy\x2Dpaxman,mary\x2Darcher,showbiz\x2Dfeatures,showbiz\x2Dtv,university\x2Dchallenge"],
								["dL_EU_brandType", dl_brand],
				["dL_EU_ClientvsPortal", dl_site],
				["dL_cmsID", "bsd\x3A21631176"],
				["cms_src", "eu-aol.com"],
				["template", "default.layout.twig"],
				["cobrand", "amp\x2Duk"],
				["plids", all_mnids, 1],
				["Custom04", (io_c3s && io_c3s.used_layout || 'desktop')]
			],
			upgradeIE: false
		};

		var getScript = typeof $.getJS === "function" && $.getJS || $.getScript;
		getScript('//s.aolcdn.com/os/aol/beacon.min.js', onBeaconLoad);
		
		//Creating multivariate tracking beacon
		function onBeaconLoad() {
			var plids = [], mvts = [];
			$('.mv-bN').each(function () {
				var beaconData = $(this).attr('data-beacon');
				if (beaconData !== '') {
					beaconData = JSON.parse(beaconData);
					if (beaconData.p && beaconData.p.plid && beaconData.p.mvt) {
						plids.push(beaconData.p.plid);
						mvts.push(beaconData.p.mvt);
					}
				}
			});
			if (mvts.length > 0) {
				bN.set('plids', plids.join(';'), true);
				bN.set('mvts', mvts.join(';'), true);
				bN.ping('mlt');
			}
		};
	}
	$(document).ready(function() {
		dataLayerTracker();
	});

}(jQuery));
</script>				<!-- User info; User Name:  Has Logged In:  -->
	<div data-module="notifications" data-init-delay>
		<script type="text/x-tea-config">{"isEnabled":true}</script>
	</div>
</body>
</html>
